      • registerDraw

        @Nullable
public OnRegularTrigger registerDraw(@NotNull
                                               java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a method to be ran while gui is open. Registered method runs on draw. Arguments passed through to method: int mouseX int mouseY float partialTicks

        Parameters:
        method - the method to run
        Returns:
        the trigger
